text: (Netubagamba nti) bwe mulongoosa mulongoseza myoyo gya mmwe, naye bwe mwonoona era gye mwonoonera, endagaano y'enkomerero bwelijja (tulibasindikira abantu) boonoone ebyenyi bya mmwe (babakkakkanye), era bagenda kuyingira omuzikiti (Jerusalemu) nga bwe baaguyingira omulundi ogwasooka, olwo nno bye baliba bawangudde babibetente olubetenta
